lines.title: A New Stage
lines.description: The $star_color glow of an {undiscovered/uncharted/unexplored} star fills the deck as your fleet exits warp.

lines.title: I Remember This Place
lines.description: The $star_color glow of the $system_name system’s star fills the deck as your fleet exits warp.

lines.title: Inky Darkness
lines.description: {There’s nowhere here to land/There are no planets in this system/Your scanners can’t locate any planets in this system.}

lines.title: Adventure Awaits
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a $chosen_planet_type. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.}

lines.title: A Silicate Turning Planet
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a Silicon planet. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} It appears you’ve made land at an ancient {mining site. Decrepit machinery has been repurposed, and the ground is cracked and rocky./city. Concrete buildings crumble around you./colony.  Massive domes still contain greenhouses and atmosphere, and it follows that people are there, too.}

lines.title: It's a Gas
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a platform orbiting a large gas giant. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you dock safely./After a smooth ride, you find yourself in a human-run station./The shuttle barrels towards the station, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} Your shuttle sets down on a landing platform. {You can’t help but stare apprehensively at the thousands of miles of clouds beneath you./The floating station sways by a gargantuan cable overhead./The station sways on its massive tower, and you unconsciously leave a hand on your shuttle as you take in the sight.}

lines.title: Just Deserts
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a desert planet. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} Sand scatters as your shuttle settles down on an old landing platform. {Mechanical obelisks whirr and chatter, and you can only guess at what they’re saying to one another./ Dunes stretch over the distant horizons, interrupted only by the ancient remains of a mining settlement, claimed for shelter by the locals./ Old structures are half buried by the sand, but it’s clear that there are still people living here.}

lines.title: The Planet is Lava!
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a planet covered in lava. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} A wave of heat blasts over you as the shuttle opens its doors. {Who decided to build anything on a lava planet?  Someone did, and now people have lived here for who knows how long./It seems you’ve landed on an old mining colony, and curious faces can be seen behind old equipment./It seems some decided to make this rocky island a home.}

lines.title: Water, Water and Not a Drop to Drink
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for an ocean planet. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} The cool mist of the sea is refreshing after so long spent onboard a ship.  {A man-made structure juts out of the tranquil ocean, rusty metal contrasting the neverending blue./As you step out of the shuttle, your feet sink into the soft sand of the beach, and you can just make out a settlement in the distance./Sleek and elegant, a small structure seems to rise out of the waves.  Below, you can almost make out a network of tubes and facilities, light floating up from the depths.}

lines.title: Fist of Iron
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a rocky, iron planet. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} The shuttle sets down as if it was made to be here.  {It very well may have been.  An old shipyard stretches toward the horizon, echoing with activity./Houses are crafted from defunct equipment and ships, leftover from when this planet was home to massive factories.  The smokestacks still mark the horizon./Sound travels far here, and you can hear people making their way through old manufacturing facilities, surely drawn by the sight of your shuttle.}

lines.title: A Snowball's Chance
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a tiny ice covered ball, in distant orbit from its sun. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} Even your warmest gear couldn’t properly prepare you for this frozen wasteland.  {The locals are wrapped in all manner of warm clothes, and have made shelters of snow which dot the landscape./It appears you’ve landed in some scientific outpost, and you can’t help but feel as if you’re an object of suspicion./You can’t imagine living here, but apparently someone could.}

lines.title: Reminds me of Home
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a friendly looking blue-green planet. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} {A vast city stretches for miles, towers clawing away from the surface of the planet.  You could see green from space, but not down here./Greenery has overtaken parts of the city you’ve found yourself in.  Trees crack through concrete and skyscrapers are coated in vines./The only reason you could recognize this place as a city was the towers piercing through the clouds.  The sea has taken half, and flora has taken the other.}

lines.title: Reminds me of Home
lines.description: You join a landing party headed for a friendly blue-green planet. {The shuttle feels as if it will shake itself apart, but you land safely in a human settlement./After a smooth ride down, you find yourself in a human settlement./The shuttle barrels towards the planet, and soon you arrive at a human settlement./Your shuttle shakes its way into a human settlement.} At least, you thought it was a human settlement, but you start to have doubts after landing.  It doesn’t look as if anyone has been here for an incredibly long time.  Strange architecture juts out of the metallic ground, and unfamiliar writing borders gargantuan archways.
